column4: platius: Madpilot , oh 1 problem, this notebook has virus, it screwed up my live usb files when i connected to the windows xp ,and live usb didnt work... would that affect the alternate cd files too? similarly... or is there a way to wipe the drive?
hopefully you're being paranoid and burning a cd on a non screwed up OS
use someone elses computer is my advice unless you can afford a possible coaster and wasted time
